mapper.insert: insert into goods_search_table(user_id, key_word, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId},#{keyWord},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update goods_search_table set user_id = #{userId}, key_word = #{keyWord}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from goods_search_table where user_id = #{userId} order by update_time desc limit 12
